definition: directly, being a system of play in which an individual defensive player guards an individual offensive player
details:
adverb
- directly
= example: directly
= synonyms: bolt, bang, slap, slapdash, smack, sheer
adjective
- being a system of play in which an individual defensive player guards an individual offensive player
= synonyms: one-on-one
- forthright and honest
= example: forthright and honest
